thread.title: Gen. Colin Powell Should Be on Republican or Democratic 2016 Presidential Ticket
thread.title_full: Gen. Colin Powell Should Be on Republican or Democratic 2016 Presidential Ticket - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Gen. Colin Powell Should Be on Republican or Democratic 2016 Presidential Ticket
text: Whether it's the Republican Party or the Democratic Party , General Colin Powell should be on somebody's ticket either as president or vice president in 2016. I heard him speak last night at " Stars & Stripes : A Salute to Our Veterans" at
